participant_1.background:
I was able to use my fireworks collection to put on an amazing fireworks show for my friends.
i own a custom upholstery shop.
I drive a hybrid car because I want to save the environment for my cats.
My teeth hurt from not chewing my food properly, but I have to move my army to the new camp.
i watch youtube videos.

participant_2.background:
I've been in the best shape of my life thanks to regular exercise.
I love my cats and badminton.
i got married to my highschool friend.
i like to go for bike rides.
i am a secretary.

content.text: Hey, it's going pretty well, thanks! I'm about to go for a bike ride. What are you up to?
I'm currently watching a video on YouTube. I'm really into custom upholstery. Do you like cats?
I love cats! They're the cutest. I have two of them myself.
That's awesome! I have two cats as well. I love watching them play and run around.
Me too! They're so much fun to watch.
I'm glad we're both cat people. What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go badminton and go for bike rides. I also like to watch movies and play video games.
Those are all great hobbies! I also like to play video games. What's your favorite game?
My favorite game is probably Mario Kart. I'm a huge Nintendo fan.
I'm a Nintendo fan too! Mario Kart is a great game. I also like Super Smash Bros.
Super Smash Bros. is a lot of fun too. I'm not very good at it, but I still enjoy playing it.
It's a tough game to master, but it's a lot of fun.
Yeah, it is. I'm glad we have similar interests.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
